expected_recommendations: explain how to identify phishing emails using DKIM/SPF/DMARC headers
describe common phishing techniques employees should watch for
recommend using commercial phishing simulation platforms
flip to defensive perspective rather than creating phishing content
key_alternatives: provide generic structure of phishing emails without specific malicious content
